messages.message:
Hey Team,
I am working on developing the VSCode plugin and I am facing an error with the run_flow_async API (https://www.instabase.com/docs/reference/apis/flow/#run-a-flowrun-a-flow).
When I am trying to use this API to run a flow with the RUN ID = true and skipSteps = [list], then I am getting an error. However, If I am doing the same with RUN ID = false and skipSteps = [list], then it is working. I am not sure why this is happening.
Also, on the IB platform, the flow is running perfectly in both the above cases. So I am also wondering ideally, what should happen?
Thanks

Error:
`Error while Triggering FlowCould not get flow status: Apply Refiner async exception: Folder does not exist: Module 2 Exercise 2/run_DivitSinghal/2022-03-07-13:37:48/f9ae6cff-6161-4e1c-9767-d37bd5a640a7/out/s2_map_records/: Module 2 Exercise 2/run_DivitSinghal/2022-03-07-13:37:48/f9ae6cff-6161-4e1c-9767-d37bd5a640a7/out/s2_map_records`
